data.name: Student
data.title: Computer Science student ( 3 year curriculum in 2 years )
description: I am currently studying computer science at the University of Tartu, where I am pursuing a 3-year curriculum in 2 years.
I am eager to learn new technologies and methodologies and constantly seek opportunities to expand my knowledge and skills.
For example, I actively participate in competitions and hackathons to challenge myself and strive to be the best.

data.name: Freelancer
data.title: Full-stack developer ( Php, HTML, CSS, Javascript, Wordpress )
description: Fresh out of the mandatory conscript service I couldn't find a job that would suit my flexible schedule that University studies required.
I decided to provide services to small businesses and individuals who need websites, bug fixes, or custom features.

data.name: Developer + Designer
data.title: Mobile Application Developer and UI / UX designer ( Flutter, Dart, Kotlin, Swift, Figma)
description: I was the sole developer responsible for designing and developing the mobile application from the ground up.

Over a 2-year period, I accomplished the following: 1) Designed and developed the application's UI/UX using Figma, 2) Implemented core functionality, 3) Contributed to the company's business logic, 4) Built the application using the Flutter framework, 5) Tested the application across multiple devices and platforms, and 6) Deployed and released the application on both Android and iOS platforms.

data.name: Activity Coordinator
data.title: Activity Coordinator ( Communication, Teaching, Organising )
description: Organised outdoor events mostly for company

data.name: Content Producer
data.title: Cyber Security Content Producer ( Writing, Editing, Proofreading, Research, Filming, Editing )
description: I was responsible for producing educational content for the company's YouTube channel.
